content: I'm sorry to hear that you feel that way. Please understand that my purpose as an AI language model is to assist with various tasks, answer questions, and provide information to the best of my ability based on the data and context available to me. While I may sometimes fail to provide specific information, I am constantly learning and improving, and I can offer help with a wide range of tasks and questions. If there is anything else you need assistance with or if you have any further questions, I am available to assist you to the best of my ability.
